author: wn.com
title: Clemson trustees endorse academic reorganization to support new strategic plan (Clemson University)
text: ( Source : Clemson University ) CLEMSON - Clemson University's Board of Trustees endorsed an academic reorganization to support the goals of a new strategic plan, essentially creating seven new colleges. The approval of the reorganization
